author: James Freeman
title: Is Trump Saving the Blue States?
text:
This column has been searching for the optimistic case for high-tax jurisdictions like New Jersey suffering from slow growth and massive unfunded pension liabilities. The search often results in less-than-optimistic commentary like the report from a money manager who emailed, “My clients are fleeing NJ like it’s on fire.”
But now a faithful reader points to the latest issue of School Leader, the magazine of the New Jersey School Boards Association. As the U.S. Supreme Court prepares to decide whether government employees can...
